title: Speaker of the House is a powerful figure

content.question: Of the following, which is the most powerful figure in Congress?

choices.label: The Chair of the House Ways and Means Committee
The Minority Whip of the Senate
The Majority Whip of the House
The Chair of the Senate Finance Committee

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
